Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Yale
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th. 

Allow extra travel time. 

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 119th between Wentworth and Yale.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Olive Harvey College
ShortDescription: Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Exit Olive Harvey, Woodlawn, 100th, Dorchester, 95th, Stony Island and 103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Exit Olive Harvey, Woodlawn, 100th, Dorchester, 95th, Stony Island and 103rd, due to street blockage near Olive Harvey College.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #106 East 103rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near Olive Harvey College
ShortDescription: Westbound #106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via  Exit Olive Harvey, Woodlawn, 100th, Dorchester, 95th, Stony Island and 103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via  Exit Olive Harvey, Woodlawn, 100th, Dorchester, 95th, Stony Island and 103rd, due to street blockage near Olive Harvey College.


Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
